1: בָּנִ֣ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Ye [are] the children</n> אַתֶּ֔ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תִתְגֹּֽדְד֗וּ <sup>1413 </sup> <n>ye shall not cut</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תָשִׂ֧ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>yourselves nor make</n> קָרְחָ֛ה <sup>7144 </sup> <n>any baldness</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> עֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>between your eyes</n> לָמֵֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>for the dead</n>

26: וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And thou shalt bestow</n> הַכֶּ֡סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>that money</n> בְּכֹל֩ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> תְּאַוֶּ֨ה <sup>183 </sup> <n>lusteth after</n> נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for whatsoever thy soul</n> בַּבָּקָ֣ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>for oxen</n> וּבַצֹּ֗אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>or for sheep</n> וּבַיַּ֙יִן֙ <sup>3196 </sup> <n>or for wine</n> וּבַשֵּׁכָ֔ר <sup>7941 </sup> <n>or for strong drink</n> וּבְכֹ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> תִּֽשְׁאָלְךָ֖ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>desireth</n> נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>or for whatsoever thy soul</n> וְאָכַ֣לְתָּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and thou shalt eat</n> שָּׁ֗ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> לִפְנֵי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>there before</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and thou shalt rejoice</n> אַתָּ֥ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>thou and thine household</n>
27: וְהַלֵּוִ֥י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>And the Levite</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בִּשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>that [is] within thy gates</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַֽעַזְבֶ֑נּוּ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>thou shalt not forsake</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> ל֛וֹ חֵ֥לֶק <sup>2506 </sup> <n>him for he hath no part</n> וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>nor inheritance</n> עִמָּֽךְ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>among</n> ס
28: מִקְצֵ֣ה ׀ <sup>7097 </sup> <n>At the end</n> שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>of three</n> שָׁנִ֗ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> תּוֹצִיא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>thou shalt bring forth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעְשַׂר֙ <sup>4643 </sup> <n>all the tithe</n> תְּבוּאָ֣תְךָ֔ <sup>8393 </sup> <n>of thine increase</n> בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>the same year</n> הַהִ֑וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and shalt</n> וְהִנַּחְתָּ֖ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and shalt lay [it] up</n> בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>within thy gates</n>
29: וּבָ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> הַלֵּוִ֡י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>And the Levite</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>has</n> לוֹ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <sup>2506 </sup> <n>(because he hath no part</n> וְנַחֲלָ֜ה <sup>5159 </sup> <n>nor inheritance</n> עִמָּ֗ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>among</n> וְ֠הַגֵּר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>with thee) and the stranger</n> וְהַיָּת֤וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>and the fatherless</n> וְהָֽאַלְמָנָה֙ <sup>490 </sup> <n>and the widow</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>which [are] within thy gates</n> וְאָכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and shall eat</n> וְשָׂבֵ֑עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and be satisfied</n> לְמַ֤עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>order</n> יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>may bless</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>thee in all the work</n> יָדְךָ֖ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hand</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which thou doest</n> ס
